title: Communitywide Federal Credit Union
Page_Title: Communitywide Federal Credit Union I Personal and Business Banking
Meta_Description: Communitywide Federal Credit Union is a member-owned financial cooperative that offers members banking services such as savings, loans, and other financial services.
Meta_Keywords: Best Personal Loan, Cheap Rate Loans, Low rate loans, Low Interest rate loans, Low APR Loans, Best Mortgage Loans, Best Student Loans, Best Auto Loans, Best Credit cards

content: Communitywide Federal Credit Union is a not-for-profit, full-service financial organisation dedicated to giving back to the communities it serves. Communitywide Federal Credit Union is based in South Bend and is Indiana's 18th biggest credit union. It is also the country's 581st largest credit union. CommunityWide Federal Credit Union has 11 locations in Indiana and mostly serves customers in the Midwest. It was founded in 1967 and had expanded to 79 staff and 61,957 members at 11 sites by December 2021. Communitywide Federal Credit Union got an A rating for its health.
As the spouse of someone who died while in our field of membership
As an immediate family member living in the same household as qualifying members.
The minimum age limit must be at least 18 years old.
Armed Forces people (active, retired, and reservists), civilian personnel, and family members of these persons.
Employer of a CW SEG so can qualify for membership and the perks that come with it

content.header: Following are the information required to complete the application:
content: Unexpired government-issued ID, driver's license, state ID, or passport with current address
A secondary form of identities, such as a Social Security card, an unexpired passport, or a state-issued ID.

link.label: Refer to the link for more details

content: There is no minimum balance requirement on any of your bank accounts however Communitywide Federal Credit Union charges $15 to create an account.
Mortgage Services, Credit Cards, Auto Loans, Personal Loans, and Student Loans are just a few of their best credit card and loan services.
They have all of your business requirements covered, from checking and savings accounts to loans, credit cards, and business tools.
Rates of return are high. CD rates at CommunityWide are among the highest in the industry. If you discover a better deal elsewhere, the bank will strive to match it.
There is no automatic renewal. Choose whether to reinvest your money in a new CD term or withdraw it.
Access to your area of interest. Choose whether you want your interest compounded with your certificate, paid into another CommunityWide account, or sent to an external bank account.
